pages.title: Gear Modifier Workbench
pages.text: The $(l)Modifier Workbench$() allows the player to craft a specific prefix or suffix on a gear piece.

A gear piece can only have one crafted modifier at a time. $(br2)Some crafted modifiers can be taught to the player by finding a $(l)Modification Archive$() inside a dungeon in The Vault at level 60+.
